languages.text: Неведомым чудом Маражаю Эзирраэшу посчастливилось пережить предательство Вольного Торговца на Эпитафии. Еще большим чудом было то, что вскоре на него наткнулся рейдовый корабль друкари, доставивший его в Комморру. Удивительно спокойный и тихий, бывший дракон Опустошительной бури удостоился аудиенции с одним из архонтов кабала Черного сердца. О чем они говорили, неведомо, но покинул дворец архонта Маражай с вооруженным отрядом и отправился на охоту за неизвестной добычей.

By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.
languages.original_text: Неведомым чудом Маражаю Эзирраэшу посчастливилось пережить предательство Вольного Торговца на Эпитафии. Еще большим чудом было то, что вскоре на него наткнулся рейдовый корабль друкари, доставивший его в Комморру. Удивительно спокойный и тихий, бывший дракон Опустошительной бури удостоился аудиенции с одним из архонтов кабала Черного сердца. О чем они говорили, неведомо, но покинул дворец архонта Маражай с вооруженным отрядом и отправился на охоту за неизвестной добычей.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to some bizarre miracle Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. An even bigger miracle came when he got spotted by the Drukhari raid ship, that delivered him to Commorragh. Strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. It is not known, what they discussed that day, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad, and embarked on a hunt for an unknown trophy.

Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

languages.text: 由于某种匪夷所思的奇迹，玛拉斋·艾泽拉什成功地在荒垄碑碣上幸存下来，没有死于行商浪人的背叛。而更幸运的是，他被一艘黑暗灵族掠袭舰接走，送回了科摩罗。这位狂风阴谋团的前任裁决官表现得出奇镇定，还得到了黑心阴谋团某位执政官的接见。没人知道他们那天讨论了什么事情，不过，玛拉斋最终带着一支全副武装的小队离开了执政官的宫殿，开始追猎某件神秘的战利品。
languages.original_text: By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

traits.locale_text: 由于某种匪夷所思的奇迹，玛拉斋·艾泽拉什成功地在荒垄碑碣上幸存下来，没有死于行商浪人的背叛。而更幸运的是，他被一艘黑暗灵族掠袭舰接走，送回了科摩罗。这位狂风阴谋团的前任裁决官表现得出奇镇定，还得到了黑心阴谋团某位执政官的接见。没人知道他们那天讨论了什么事情，不过，玛拉斋最终带着一支全副武装的小队离开了执政官的宫殿，开始追猎某件神秘的战利品。

languages.text: Durch ein bizarres Wunder gelang es Marazhai Aezyrraesh, den Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf Epitaph zu überleben. Durch noch viel größeres Glück wurde er von einem Drukhari-Plünderschiff aufgegabelt und nach Commorragh gebracht. Der ehemalige Dracon des plündernden Sturms, der sonderbar ruhig und still auftrat, erhielt eine Audienz bei einem der Archonten der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens. Was dort besprochen wurde, ist bis heute unbekannt, doch Marazhai verließ den Palast des Archonten mit einem bewaffneten Trupp und begab sich auf die Jagd nach einer geheimen Trophäe.
languages.original_text: By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

traits.locale_text: Durch ein bizarres Wunder gelang es Marazhai Aezyrraesh, den Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf Epitaph zu überleben. Durch noch viel größeres Glück wurde er von einem Drukhari-Plünderschiff aufgegabelt und nach Commorragh gebracht. Der ehemalige Dracon des plündernden Sturms, der sonderbar ruhig und still auftrat, erhielt eine Audienz bei einem der Archonten der Kabale des Schwarzen Herzens. Was dort besprochen wurde, ist bis heute unbekannt, doch Marazhai verließ den Palast des Archonten mit einem bewaffneten Trupp und begab sich auf die Jagd nach einer geheimen Trophäe.

languages.text: Par un étrange miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh parvint à survivre à la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur Épitaphe. Par une chance plus incroyable encore, il fut récupéré par un vaisseau de pillards drukharis et conduit à Commorragh. L'ancien dracon de la Tempête ravageuse, qui se comportait de manière étrangement calme et silencieuse, obtint une audience auprès de l'un des archontes de la Kabale du Cœur Noir. Nul ne sait de quoi ils discutèrent, mais Marazhai quitta le palais de l'archonte avec une escouade armée et partit à la recherche d'un mystérieux trophée.
languages.original_text: By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

traits.locale_text: Par un étrange miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh parvint à survivre à la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur Épitaphe. Par une chance plus incroyable encore, il fut récupéré par un vaisseau de pillards drukharis et conduit à Commorragh. L'ancien dracon de la Tempête ravageuse, qui se comportait de manière étrangement calme et silencieuse, obtint une audience auprès de l'un des archontes de la Kabale du Cœur Noir. Nul ne sait de quoi ils discutèrent, mais Marazhai quitta le palais de l'archonte avec une escouade armée et partit à la recherche d'un mystérieux trophée.

languages.text: Por algún extraño milagro, Marazhai Aezyrraesh logró sobrevivir a la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en Epitafio. Aún más suerte necesitó para que una nave de asalto Drukhari le recogiera y le llevara a Commorragh. Con una calma muy inusual en él, el antiguo dracón de la Tempestad Asoladora consiguió una audiencia con uno de los Arcontes de la Kábala del Corazón Negro. Se desconoce de qué hablaron ese día, pero Marazhai salió del palacio del Arconte con un escuadrón armado y partió en una cacería en busca de un trofeo secreto.
languages.original_text: By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

traits.locale_text: Por algún extraño milagro, Marazhai Aezyrraesh logró sobrevivir a la traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en Epitafio. Aún más suerte necesitó para que una nave de asalto Drukhari le recogiera y le llevara a Commorragh. Con una calma muy inusual en él, el antiguo dracón de la Tempestad Asoladora consiguió una audiencia con uno de los Arcontes de la Kábala del Corazón Negro. Se desconoce de qué hablaron ese día, pero Marazhai salió del palacio del Arconte con un escuadrón armado y partió en una cacería en busca de un trofeo secreto.

languages.text: とある不可思議な奇跡により、マラズハイ・アエジレシュはエピタフで自由開拓者の裏切りに遭ってなお生き残ることができた。偶然はさらに重なり、マラズハイはデュカーリの襲撃船に拾われてコモラフへ送り届けられる。かつて〈略奪の嵐〉のドラコンであった男は、奇妙に落ち着き払った様子で 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉のアーコンのひとりと謁見を許された。会談の内容は不明だが、マラズハイは武装隊を伴ってアーコンの宮殿を去り、秘密の戦利品を探す旅に出た。
languages.original_text: By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

traits.locale_text: とある不可思議な奇跡により、マラズハイ・アエジレシュはエピタフで自由開拓者の裏切りに遭ってなお生き残ることができた。偶然はさらに重なり、マラズハイはデュカーリの襲撃船に拾われてコモラフへ送り届けられる。かつて〈略奪の嵐〉のドラコンであった男は、奇妙に落ち着き払った様子で 陰謀団〈黒き心臓〉のアーコンのひとりと謁見を許された。会談の内容は不明だが、マラズハイは武装隊を伴ってアーコンの宮殿を去り、秘密の戦利品を探す旅に出た。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, mucize eseri Hür Tacir'in Sinyazıt'taki ihanetini sağ atlatmayı başardı. Hatta şansına bir Drukhari baskın gemisi tarafından bulunup Commorragh'a götürüldü. Kara Yürek Kabalı Arkonlarından biri, tuhaf derecede sakin ve sessiz davranan eski Müfteris Kasırga Drakonu ile görüşmeyi kabul etti. O gün ne konuştukları bilinmese de Marazhai, Arkon'un sarayından silahlı bir mangayla ayrıldı ve gezegeni terk ederek gizli bir ganimetin peşine düştü.
languages.original_text: By some bizarre miracle, Marazhai Aezyrraesh managed to survive the Rogue Trader's betrayal on Epitaph. Even more fortuitously, he was picked up by a Drukhari raiding ship and delivered to Commorragh. Acting strangely calm and quiet, the former Dracon of the Reaving Tempest was granted an audience with one of the Archons of the Kabal of the Black Heart. What they discussed that day is unknown, but Marazhai left the Archon's palace with an armed squad and embarked on a hunt for a secret trophy.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh mucize eseri Hür Tacir'in Kitabe'deki ihanetinden hayatta kalmayı başardı. Hatta şansına bir Drukhari baskın gemisi tarafından bulundu ve Commorragh'a götürüldü. Siyah Yürek Kabalı Arkonlarından biri, tuhaf derecede sakin ve sessiz davranan Müfteris Kasırga eski Drakon'u ile görüşmeyi kabul etti. O gün ne konuştukları bilinmiyor ancak Marazhai, Arkon'un sarayından silahlı bir mangayla ayrıldı ve gezegeni terk ederek gizli bir ganimetin peşine düştü.
